name: Crash Glass Bottle Puzzle
description:
Did you tire and want to relieve stress? Would you like to come up with something new to the party? Crash Glass Bottle Puzzle app wonderful option to do so.
The game has a rolling machine on which bottles move and a crusher that moves down on tapping the screen. Just aim at the bottles and crush them at the appropriate time. There is no limit, you can smash as many bottles as possible. Speed of the bottles increases with the increment in the score, game has different types of bottles like fire bottles that moves faster, smashing them is a real challenge and it makes game more interesting and more fun to play.
